## 描述

[rsappend_101ghfuaori488hs9.zip.7ad1c0843bf6c85d58a2473cda004d90](./assets/rsappend_101ghfuaori488hs9.zip.7ad1c0843bf6c85d58a2473cda004d90)

## 题解

同一个 n，多个 e 加密同一信息，随便找两个 e 出来用这题 [very hard RSA](./very%20hard%20RSA.md) 的算法就好。

```python
import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(10000000)

def exgcd(a, b):
    if not b:
        return a, 1, 0
    d, y, x = exgcd(b, a % b)
    return d, x, y - a // b * x

def inv(a, p):
    d, x, y = exgcd(a, p)
    return (x + p) % p

def fpow(a, b, c):
    a = a % c
    r = 1
    if b < 0:
        a = inv(a, c)
        b = -b
    while b:
        if b & 1:
            r = r * a % c
        a = a * a % c
        b = b >> 1
    return r

n = 
e1 = 3493354673
e2 = 340864687
c1 = 
c2 = 
_, s1, s2 = exgcd(e1, e2)

m = fpow(c1, s1, n) * fpow(c2, s2, n) % n

hx = bytes.fromhex(format(m, 'x'))
print(hx)
```

## 答案

flag{we_do_ctf_together_for_fun}
